resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157023</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157023</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2265</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">THe Earth - Elements of Geology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Masse - Elemente von Geologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La terre - éléments de géologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A terra - elementos da geologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La terra - elementi di geologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">THe γη - στοιχεία της γεωλογίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La tierra - elementos de la geología</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A digital Geology text book accompanied by many animations, arricles and interactive quizzes as well as a glossary of geologival terms. The information is organized according to chapters of the book</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">the universe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">science education</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein digitales Geologietextbuch begleitet von 
vielen Animationen, von arricles und von interaktiven Quizen sowie ein
Glossar von geologival Bezeichnungen. Die Informationen werden 
entsprechend Kapiteln des Buches organisiert</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un manuel digital de géologie accompagné de 
beaucoup d'animations, arricles et jeux interactifs aussi bien qu'un 
glossaire des limites geologival. L'information est organisée 
selon des chapitres du livre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um livro de texto digital da geologia acompanhado 
por muitos animations, arricles e quizzes interativos as.well.as um 
glossário de termos geologival. A informação é organizada de
acordo com capítulos do livro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un manuale digitale di geologia accompagnato da 
molti animazioni, arricles e quiz interattivi così come un glossario 
dei termini geologival. Le informazioni sono organizzate secondo
i capitoli del libro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα ψηφιακό βιβλίο κειμένων γεωλογίας που 
συνοδεύεται από πολλούς ζωτικότητες, arricles και διαλογικούς 
διαγωνισμοους γνώσεων καθώς επίσης και ένα γλωσσάρι geologival
όρων. Οι πληροφορίες οργανώνονται σύμφωνα με τα κεφάλαια 
του βιβλίου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un libro de texto digital de la geología 
acompañado por muchas animaciones, arricles y concursos interactivos 
así como un glosario de términos geologival. La información 
se ordena según los capítulos del libro</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">das Universum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'univers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de la science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o universo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução da ciência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'universo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di scienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ο κόσμος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση επιστήμης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Geología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el universo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">educación de la ciencia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
